The COVID: 19 tests are not rigged and do not produce false positives. There is no evidence to suggest that labs are deliberately manipulating test results.
The death count from COVID: 19 is not false. It is currently at about 187,000 in the United States and rising. There may even be an undercount of COVID-19 cases in the country.

The claim that weak immune systems are s: 19 deaths is not accurate. While individuals with weakened immune systems may be more susceptible to severe illness, anyone can catch COVID-19 if exposed to the virus.
